block.p: MARCH-David. 87 years old, died on October 7, 2000. Beloved husband of Belle. Devoted father of Janice and Steven Friedman, and Dr. Lewis and the late Kathy March. Cherished grandfather of Emily, Rebekah, Jacob, Erika, Aaron, Zachary and Benjamin. Dearest brother of Harold and the late William. Services Sunday, 10 AM, at ''Riverside-Nassau North Chapels,'' 55 North Station Plaza (opposite LIRR), Great Neck, NY.
